HandyJORM.query

Class SoftQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • HandyJORM.query.SoftQuery

  • public class SoftQuery
extends java.lang.Object
    A SQL "SELECT" query. Each method is a "state" of the query. Example : SoftQuery sq = new SoftQuery(dbSess); sq.select(modelAtb) .from(model) .all();
